text.0: by goodly paths lead us to riches agni god who knowest every sacred duty.
text.1: remove the sin that makes us stray and wander most ample adoration will we bring thee.
text.2: lead us anew to happiness o agni lead us beyond all danger and affliction.
text.3: be unto us a wide broad ample castle bless prosper on their way our sons and offspring.
text.4: far from us agni put thou all diseases let them strike lauds that have no saving agni.
text.5: god make our home again to be a blessing with all the immortal deities o holy.
text.6: preserve us agni with perpetual succour refulgent in the dwelling which thou lovest.
text.7: o conqueror most youthful let no danger touch him who praises thee today or after.
text.8: give not us up a prey to sin o agni the greedy enemy that brings us trouble.
text.9: not to the fanged that bites not to the toothless give not us up thou conqueror to the spoiler.
text.10: such as thou art born after law o agni when lauded give protection to our bodies.
text.11: from whosoever would reproach or injure for thou god rescuest from all oppression.
text.12: thou well discerning both these classes comest to men at early morn o holy agni.
text.13: be thou obedient unto man at evening to be adorned as keen by eager suitors.
text.14: to him have we addressed our pious speeches i mānas son to him victorious agni.
text.15: may we gain countless riches with the sages may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
